footer.contact: Contact us for support or information about our events.

title-introduce.third: I’m a web developer, designer, content creator and maker of interesting things.

about-me.title: Hello, my name is Min - I am a web developer and web designer in Vietnam.
about-me.description-1: I want to create work with heart, purpose and originality. Some of my favorite projects include creating art, my painting for freedom program, and you may have come across some of my products on the market. I once participated in creating the Japanese comic book Flower That Day! , Memories of a time, ... At the same time, I have also participated in the development of a few Web3 projects such as Sightsea.
about-me.description-2: Previously, I was a freelance illustrator, but now I have stopped it and become a developer. It doesn't mean I'm giving up on it, but I will keep it because it is my passion.

my-teams.title: My Teams

404.description: Oh my wonderful eyes must sometimes get lost. Let me paint a beautiful picture for life to brighten your life's path!
